ValidationRule.description: Requires that the Audio Type is Event when the event is L3 and a participant list is included.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Premium Event", $RecordType.Name <> "L3 Standard Event", $RecordType.Name <> "RT Event", $RecordType.Name <> "Webcasting", $RecordType.Name <> "300 Port", $RecordType.Name <> "Dry Run", $RecordType.Name <> "SSBA", ISPICKVAL( Booked_With__c , "Level 3"), Participant_list_included__c = TRUE, NOT(ISPICKVAL( RT_Event_Type__c , "Operator Assisted Premium")))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Level 3 with participant lists must be Operator Assisted Premium.
